creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
The ASF provides git mirroring of log4j as documented on http://git.apache.org and elsewhere.  The log4j site has no mention of it.  Unfortunately, the Maven POM schema only allows one <scm> element and trying to add two resulted in no joy.

My intended approach is to hack the pom with the appropriate git URL's, look at the generated pages and then reconstruct them with APT.  If there is a better approach, please advise.

creator: grobmeier@gmail.com
text: As the git mirror is readonly, i propose a simple textual reference on the site itself.
